Create objects from class PeriodicArModel

PeriodicArModel-methods.Rd

Create objects from class PeriodicArModel

PeriodicArModel(object, ...)

Arguments

object

an object, can have one of a number of classes.

...

further arguments for methods.

Details

PeriodicArModel creates objects from class PeriodicArModel. This is a generic function with despatch methods on the first argument.

Value

an object from class "PeriodicArModel"

Methods

signature(object = "matrix")

"object" gives the coefficients, one row per season.

signature(object = "numeric")

"object" gives the model order. Its length is taken to be the number of seasons. The coefficients are set to NA.

%\item{\code{signature(object = "PeriodicArmaSpec")}}{ % \code{"object"} is taken to specify the AR part of the model. Its % class should have suitable methods. This is the case for classes % from this package. %%% ~~describe this method here~~ %} % %\item{\code{signature(object = "PeriodicFilter")}}{ % Another way to specify the Ar part of the model. \code{"object"} is % converted internally to \code{"PeriodicArFilter"}. %%% ~~describe this method here~~ %} %%% \item{\code{signature(object = "PeriodicArmaModel")}}{{ %%% %% ~~describe this method here~~ %%% }
signature(object = "PeriodicMonicFilterSpec")

signature(object = "VirtualPeriodicArmaModel")

signature(object = "PeriodicMonicFilterSpec")

signature(object = "VirtualPeriodicArmaModel")
